      • addRegexRule

        protected static void addRegexRule(String regex)
        Add a regex rule to filter on URLs and response bodies. The replacement for the pattern should be available in the URL.
        Parameters:
        regex - the regex pattern that a match will be found in the URL

      • addRegexRule

        protected static void addRegexRule(String regex,
                                   String replacement)

      • setupTest

        protected void setupTest()
                  throws Exception
        Turn on the test recording / mocking from this point on until resetTest() is called. The current test name will be set as the name of the current test running. Only call this if there's no other tests running. Otherwise the call will be ignored and the traffic will be stored in the record file from the last setupTest() call.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • setupTest

        protected static void setupTest(String testName)
                         throws Exception
        Turn on the test recording / mocking from this point on until resetTest() is called with the file name of the mock record specified. Only call this if there's no other tests running. Otherwise the call will be ignored and the traffic will be stored in the record file from the last setupTest() call. Example: public void setup() { setupTest("testA"); cleanup(); resetTest("testA"); } public void cleanup() { setupTest("testB"); getSomeTraffic(); resetTest("testB"); } The traffic from getSomeTraffic will be stored in testA.json.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • resetTest

        protected void resetTest()
                  throws Exception
        Turn off the mocking / recording setup by a previous setupTest() call.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • resetTest

        protected static void resetTest(String testName)
                         throws Exception
        Resets the test with name @testName. This reset call is only valid for tests setup earlier with the same testName.
        Parameters:
        testName -
        Throws:
        Exception
